document_name: Decree No. 2014-0816-P-RM of 27 October 2014 suspending the collection of Value Added Tax, duties and taxes on renewable energy equipment on importation
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2014/MLI-2014-09-19-Decree No. 2014-0816-P-RM of 27 October 2014 suspending the collection of Value Added Tax, duties and taxes on renewable energy equipment on importation_43b7c34d8accb6b33a3d5af18ddfb1a6.pdf
document_description: This decree suspends the collection of Value Added Tax, duties and taxes on renewable energy equipment on importation. The decree lists all the equipements included in the exemption.
